racial_powers.Dragonborn Fury: When you're bloodied, you gain a +1 racial bonus to attack rolls
racial_powers.Draconic Heritage: Your hearing surge value is equal to one-quarter of your maximum hit points + your Constitution modifier
racial_powers.Dragon Breath: You can use dragon breath as an encounter power

description: Short humanoids that are hardy and originally come from the mountains
name: Dwarf

racial_powers.Cast-Iron Stomach: +5 racial bonus to saving throws against poison
racial_powers.Dwarven Resilience: You can use your second wind as a minor action instead of a standard action
racial_powers.Dwarven Weapon Proficiency: You gain proficiency with the throwing hammer and the warhammer
racial_powers.Encumbered Speed: You move at your normal speed even when it would normally be reduced by armor or a heavy load. Other effects that limit speed (like difficult terrain or magical effects) affect you normally
racial_powers.Stand your ground: When an effect forced you to move like a push, pull, or slide- you can move 1 square less than the effect specifies. So moves that would require you to move 1, you move none. And when an attack would knock you prone, you can instantly make a saving throw to avoid being prone

description: Similar to elves, but more closely related to the Feywild. They are considered a type of Fey
name: Eladrin

racial_powers.Eladrin Education: You gain training in one additional skill selected from the skill list in Chapter 5
racial_powers.Eladrin Weapon Proficiency: You gain proficiency with the longsword
racial_powers.Eladrin Will: You gain a +1 racial bonus to your Will defense. And, you get +5 bonus to saving throws against charm effects
racial_powers.Fey Origin: Your ancestors were native to the Feywild, so you are considered a fey creature for the purpose of effects that relate to creature origin.
racial_powers.Trance: Rather than sleep, eladrin meditate in a trance. You only need to spend 4 hours in this state to gain the same benefits other races gain from taking a 6 hour extended rest. While in a trance, you are fully aware of your surroundings and notice approaching enemies and other events as normal
racial_powers.Fey Step: You can use fey step as an encounter power

racial_powers.Half-Orc Resilience: First time you get bloodied in an encounter, you get 5 temp HP. They increase at higher levels
racial_powers.Swift Charge: +2 bonus to speed when you charge
racial_powers.Furious Assault: Encounter power when you hit an adversary that deals one extra weapon damage die, or 1d8 if no weapon used.
